rules_text:
{V}{V}: Kaleidoscamp becomes the colors of mana spent to activate this ability with base power and toughness 3/2. [i](Spend a different color of mana on each {V}.)[/i]
{V}{V}{V}: If Kaleidoscamp is multicolored, it becomes all colors with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying, vigilance, and trample.
{V}{V}{V}{V}: If Kaleidoscamp is all colors, exile the top two cards of your library. You may cast one of them without paying its mana cost.
